function.name: Tunnel Opened
function.description: This function is called by the Tunneling client plugin whenever a tunnel is opened. Clients may open tunnels by sending a Request Tunnel command.

arg.name: tunnelId
arg.description: The identifier of the tunnel that has been opened.

function.name: Data Received
function.description: This function is called by the Tunneling client plugin whenever data is received from a server through a tunnel.

arg.name: tunnelId
arg.description: The identifier of the tunnel through which the data was received.

arg.name: data
arg.description: Buffer containing the raw octets of the data.

arg.name: dataLen
arg.description: The length in octets of the data.

function.name: Data Error
function.description: This function is called by the Tunneling client plugin whenever a data error occurs on a tunnel. Errors occur if a device attempts to send data on tunnel that is no longer active or if the tunneling does not belong to the device.

arg.name: tunnelId
arg.description: The identifier of the tunnel on which this data error occurred.
